title: Concurrent Legislative Jurisdiction over United States Military Installations
subject: military affairs and related matters

abstracts.abstract: Concurrent Legislative Jurisdiction over United States Military Installations;  Declaring that the state accepts the relinquishment of exclusive legislative jurisdiction from the United States in accordance with specified provisions; providing that this state has concurrent legislative jurisdiction with the United States over United States military installations located within the boundaries of this state; specifying that such jurisdiction is effective upon the Governor’s written acceptance of a request filed by the principal officer, or other specified representative who has supervision or control over the military installation, etc.

actions.description: Referred to Judiciary; Military and Veterans Affairs, Space, and Domestic Security; Rules
